Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This product is truly exceptional, offering unparalleled value and functionality. Considering its quality and the benefits it provides, we believe it's worth more than its face value of $10,000. However, to make this opportunity even more appealing, I am extending a special offer to you. For a limited time only, you can acquire this product for just $9,500. This is an excellent chance to secure a high-quality item at a discounted rate. Please let me know if you're interested in taking advantage of this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
